name: Energy-Spike
description:
• W Key – Jump
  • A/D key (Ground) – Move left/right
  • A/D key (Air) – Rotate clockwise/anti-clockwise
  • T Key – Use Flare Up (at least 1 orange bar needed)
  • T+W – Use Hurricane (at least 1 green bar needed)
  • T+A/D – Use Wind Jump (at least 1 yellow bar needed)
  • T+S – Use Tsunami (at least 1 blue bar needed)

An Arcade skating game in which the skaters goes around the smog-infested area performing tricks on various renewable energy resources. Doing tricks on them give the skater the power to dispel the invading smog from its city.
